files.description: Single CLI entrypoint that sets all RNG seeds, runs the canonical pipeline end-to-end, writes outputs/results.json and outputs/figure.png with a fixed schema, and writes outputs/hashes.json containing SHA256 hashes for determinism verification.
Deterministic canonical pipeline implementation (data generation/loading, computation, and figure creation) invoked by the CLI with a stable artifact contract.
Utilities for setting and validating deterministic behavior (seed setting across libraries, environment flags, and stable serialization helpers).
Artifact contract utilities defining fixed output paths, JSON schema construction, atomic writes, and SHA256 hashing for each produced artifact.
Figure generation routines that produce a deterministic PNG (fixed size, style, and rendering parameters) from pipeline results.
End-to-end test that runs the CLI twice in a temporary workspace and asserts identical hashes.json and byte-for-byte identical artifacts for determinism.
Test that validates outputs/results.json matches the fixed schema (required keys, types, and stable ordering) and that hashes.json contains expected entries.
CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs formatting/lint checks if configured, and executes tests to enforce deterministic artifact generation on each push/PR.
Project configuration defining dependencies, optional CLI entrypoint configuration, and test tooling settings to support local runs and CI.
Documentation describing the deterministic outputs-first artifact contract, how to run src/run.py, and how to verify determinism via outputs/hashes.json.

missionDescription: Create a single CLI entrypoint (e.g., src/run.py) that (1) sets all RNG seeds, (2) runs the canonical pipeline, (3) writes ./outputs/results.json and ./outputs/figure.png with a fixed schema, and (4) writes ./outputs/hashes.json containing SHA256 of each artifact for determinism verification.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly establishes the /outputs contract by producing deterministic, overwrite-safe artifacts (results.json, figure.png) and adds a determinism check, enabling regression testing and stable iteratio...
projectName: single CLI entrypoint (e.g., src/run.py) that (1) sets all RNG seeds, (2) runs the canonical pipeline, (3) writes ./outputs/results.json and ./outputs/figure.png with a fixed schema, and (4) writes ./outputs/hashes.json containing SHA256 of each artifact for determinism verification.
